verses.verse: Though <WG1437> I speak<WG2980> with the<WG3588> tongues<WG1100> of men<WG444> and<WG2532> of angels,<WG32> and<WG1161> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> charity,<WG26> I am become<WG1096> as sounding<WG2278> brass,<WG5475> or<WG2228> a tinkling<WG214> cymbal.<WG2950>

And <WG2532> though<WG1437> I have<WG2192> the gift of prophecy,<WG4394> and<WG2532> understand<WG1492> all<WG3956> mysteries,<WG3466> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> knowledge;<WG1108> and<WG2532> though<WG1437> I have<WG2192> all<WG3956> faith,<WG4102> so that<WG5620> I could remove<WG3179> mountains,<WG3735> and<WG1161> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> charity,<WG26> I am<WG1510> nothing.<WG3762>

And <WG2532> though<WG1437> I bestow all my goods to feed<WG5595> <WG3956> <WG3450> <WG5224> the poor, and<WG2532> though<WG1437> I give<WG3860> my<WG3450> body<WG4983> to<WG2443> be burned,<WG2545> and<WG2532> have<WG2192> not<WG3361> charity,<WG26> it profiteth<WG5623> me nothing.<WG3762>
Charity <WG26> suffereth long,<WG3114> and is kind;<WG5541> charity<WG26> envieth<WG2206> not;<WG3756> charity<WG26> vaunteth not itself,<WG4068> <WG3756> is not<WG3756> puffed up,<WG5448>
Doth not<WG3756> behave itself unseemly,<WG807> seeketh<WG2212> not<WG3756> her own,<WG1438> is not<WG3756> easily provoked,<WG3947> thinketh<WG3049> no<WG3756> evil;<WG2556>
Rejoiceth <WG5463> not<WG3756> in<WG1909> iniquity,<WG93> but<WG1161> rejoiceth<WG4796> in the<WG3588> truth;<WG225>
Beareth <WG4722> all things,<WG3956> believeth<WG4100> all things,<WG3956> hopeth<WG1679> all things,<WG3956> endureth<WG5278> all things.<WG3956>

Charity <WG26> never<WG3763> faileth:<WG1601> but<WG1161> whether<WG1535> there be prophecies,<WG4394> they shall fail;<WG2673> whether<WG1535> there be tongues,<WG1100> they shall cease;<WG3973> whether<WG1535> there be knowledge,<WG1108> it shall vanish away.<WG2673>
For <WG1063> we know<WG1097> in<WG1537> part,<WG3313> and<WG2532> we prophesy<WG4395> in<WG1537> part.<WG3313>
But <WG1161> when<WG3752> that which is perfect<WG5046> is come,<WG2064> then<WG5119> that<WG3588> which is in<WG1537> part<WG3313> shall be done away.<WG2673>

When <WG3753> I was<WG2252> a child,<WG3516> I spake<WG2980> as<WG5613> a child,<WG3516> I understood<WG5426> as<WG5613> a child,<WG3516> I thought<WG3049> as<WG5613> a child:<WG3516> but<WG1161> when<WG3753> I became<WG1096> a man,<WG435> I put away<WG2673> childish things.<WG3588> <WG3516>

For <WG1063> now<WG737> we see<WG991> through<WG1223> a glass,<WG2072> darkly;<WG1722> <WG135> but<WG1161> then<WG5119> face<WG4383> to<WG4314> face:<WG4383> now<WG737> I know<WG1097> in<WG1537> part;<WG3313> but<WG1161> then<WG5119> shall I know<WG1921> even as<WG2531> also<WG2532> I am known.<WG1921>
And <WG1161> now<WG3570> abideth<WG3306> faith,<WG4102> hope,<WG1680> charity,<WG26> these<WG5023> three;<WG5140> but<WG1161> the greatest<WG3187> of these<WG5130> is charity.<WG26>
